thread.section_title: APMEX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of APMEX | www.apmex.com | 2 of 379
thread.title: Jonathan De Loach
thread.title_full: APMEX reviewed by Jonathan De Loach

author: Jonathan De Loach
title: Jonathan De Loach
text: I truly appreciate how fast and accurate ordering from Apmex can be. I order from them on a regular basis and have never been disappointed. I usually receive my units within a few days and the shipping is free. I started in the precious metals business one year two years ago. I mostly do business with Apmex now and will continue as time moves forward.
